law.catch_line: Qualifications for law enforcement telecommunicator -- Information not subject to disclosure.

text.section: Provisions of the Open Records Act, KRS 61.870 to 61.884, to the contrary notwithstanding, the applicant's home address, telephone number, date of birth, Social Security number, and results of any background investigation, psychological suitability screening, and polygraph examination conducted under this section shall not be subject to disclosure.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 30, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 315, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986.
